definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a colony .
Of or pertaining to a period when a country or territory was a colony.
Of or pertaining to the ideals of colonialism .
Of or relating to the original Thirteen Colonies of the USA .
Of or relating to the style of architecture prevalent at about the time of the Revolution .
Tending to form colonies (especially of cells).

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a colony .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to a period when a country or territory was a colony.
Of or pertaining to the ideals of colonialism .
( US ) Of or relating to the original Thirteen Colonies of the USA .
( US ) Of or relating to the style of architecture prevalent at about the time of the Revolution .
( biology ) Tending to form colonies (especially of cells).
